mapper.select:
select a.POST_USER_ID as postUserId, a.POST_ID as postId, a.USER_ID as userId, a.CREATE_BY as createBy, a.CREATE_DATE as createDate, a.CREATE_TIME as createTime, a.UPDATE_BY as updateBy, a.UPDATE_DATE as updateDate, a.UPDATE_TIME as updateTime
from T_SYS_POST_USER a where 1=1 order by a.POST_USER_ID
